pages.text:
Upcoming Events
Bonsai and Brews every 3rd Wed at Caledonia Brewing
Caledonia Brewing  at The Dunedin Beer Fest 2017
Weekly and Monthly Events
Caledonia Drinking Society Member Night-
every Tuesday, members enjoy $1 off mug fills. Member renew in March, any open spaces will be chosen via lottery.
Music Trivia every Thursday
– Join us for Tampa bay’s original and best music trivia. We do it every Thursday at 7:30 pm, all decades, all genres music. Prizes for the top 3 teams and the top team gets to hoist the coveted unicorn trophy in glory. Hosted by Big Trophy Trivia.
Retrograde: Music Videos from the 80’s and 90’s
– VJ Hural Knight plays all your favorite Alternative and New Wave Music Videos from the 80’s and 90’s on the TVs at Caledonia. We do this every Sunday night from 7-10pm 21 and up.
New World Celts Monthly Meeting
–
NWC meet the 1st Monday of every month, come meet some new friends and see what great things they do for our community.
Bonsai Workshop with Thunderstruck Bonsai
– Aug 20th 7pm.  (3rd Wed of every month) Come pick a tree and a pot and then turn it into a beautiful Bonsai with all instruction and materials provided. Get tickets
here
Mandala Monday
– Aug 25th 6:30 pm-Join Jennifer of HomeGrown & RockSolid for this fun & creative class learning simple techniques to create your own mandala creation.
Sign up here
Bacon Brunch
– Sept 7th 11:30am Palate Culinary Services serves up a delicious gourmet brunch here at the brewery.
Tickets
required.
Pop Up Plant Shop with Evergreen Plant Experience
– Sept 3rd 6-9 pm
Backspin with DJenerate-
Aug 15th, 3rd Friday of every month, DJ playing old school themes, requests and more
Music Bingo
–  Aug 18th 7:30pm-3rd Mon of every month, Free to
Play
, 21 and up
Bubbles and Bingo
–  2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month, Our own Alex is hosting  Bingo night at Caledonia. Join her for traditional
bingo with a bubbly twist
. We will have specials on Prosecco and Champagne as well as discounted charcuterie. 21 and up
Paint Workshop with
Wine and Canvas
–
Aug 27th 6pm
